Hello, thanks for applying to become a watcher for the {{region}} region.

There is a little screening process I want to do for the applicants to ensure that we are all on the same page.
For this I am requiring contributors to have at least 100h in the game.

Please either link me to your steamcommunity page or send me a screenshot of your gametime within your steam profile and that would suffice.

Also I would like to answer any question you might have regarding the project.
